dmca.title: Notice of violation
dmca.body:
From: Rick S. Geiger, Esq. [mailto:rsgeiger@geigerlawfirm.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, August 31, 2005 2:12 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Notice of violation


Please see attached notice of violation.
 
Please contact me at your earliest convenience.
 
                                    Rick Geiger
 
 


This email may contain confidential information which is legally privileged.
The information is solely for the use of the addressee named above. If you
are not the intended recipient, any disclosure, copying, distribution or
other use of the contents of this information is strictly prohibited. If you
have received this email in error, please notify us by return email and
delete this message. Thank you. 


Rick S. Geiger, Esq. 
Law Office of Rick S. Geiger, LLC 
Pittsford, New York 14534 
http://www.GeigerLawFirm.com 
585-230-5511 
rsgeiger@geigerlawfirm.com

-=[ P$2NF0_COM - PS2BANZ_COM - P$20WNZ_COM - LEMONPARTY_ORG - GOATSX_DE ]=-.htm
